title: CLEAR_PED_PROP
content:
0x2D23D743// ClearPedProp
void CLEAR_PED_PROP(Ped ped, int propId);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.propId: The prop id you want to clear from the ped. Refer to SET_PED_PROP_INDEX.CLEAR_PED_PROPThis is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native CLEAR_PED_PROP.
codeBlocks:
// ClearPedProp
void CLEAR_PED_PROP(Ped ped, int propId);
